name: webvr-deploy
description: Tools for managing server deployment of WebVR services.

scripts.https_key: shx mkdir -p _build && shx openssl req -new -newkey rsa:4096 -sha512 -days 365 -nodes -x509 -subj '/C=US/ST=Denial/L=Springfield/O=Dis/CN=www.example.com' -keyout _build/key.pem -out _build/cert.pem
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf .cache tmp && shx mkdir -p .cache tmp
